name: Power Line 48
description:
Rhythm game about about sending a signal in a motherboard. Tap along to the music and challenge yourself in a frantic infinite runner. Made as part of the Global Game Jam. Check out the Jam page here. https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/power-line-48

Credits:
